issue.title: Can't run training and identification in same run

content.raw:
_From [hoffman...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112579936970974005212/) on April 12, 2011 13:41:36_

Training and identification in the same run are no longer a documented/supported feature. Changed to an enhancement.

**Labels:** -Type-Defect -Priority-High -Milestone-Release1.0 Type-Enhancement Priority-Low
